::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gf_histogram(~price, data = diamonds) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 1A: Diamond Prices",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](histogram_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gf_histogram(~price,
  data = diamonds,
  bins = 100
) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 1B: Diamond Prices",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](histogram_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
diamonds %>%
  gf_histogram(~carat) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 2A: Carats of Diamonds",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](histogram_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
diamonds %>%
  gf_histogram(~carat,bins=100) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 2A: Carats of Diamonds",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](histogram_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
